titles.title: 807 You Must Be Born Again (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A ruler once came
To Jesus by night
To ask Him the way
Of salvation and light
The Master made answer
In words true and plain
You must be born again

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You must be born again
You must be born again
I verily verily say unto you
You must be born again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You children of men
Attend to the word
So solemnly uttered
By Jesus the Lord
And let not this message
To you be in vain
You must be born again

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O you who would enter
That glorious rest
And sing with the ransomed
The song of the blest
The life everlasting
If you would obtain
You must be born again
